title: r/AmITheA**hole For Refusing To Give A Karen Her Tip Back?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP is a waitress and has an encounter with an absolutely awful Karen who tries to make everybody's lives miserable for now reason. Karen's husband leaves OP a $40 tip as a way to apologize for his wife's disgusting behavior. When the Karen finds out, she completely flips out and demands that OP give her the money back. What a disgrace! If you like this video, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
